pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, August 4, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Duncan, British Columbia

2:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour the BC Forest Discovery Centre and meet with workers from local forestry businesses.

BC Forest Discovery Centre
2892 Drinkwater Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage of the visit
    • All photo opportunities will take place outdoors
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.

Richmond, British Columbia

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Richmond Night Market and deliver brief remarks.

Richmond Night Market
8351 River Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 8:00 p.m. via the main entrance and present themselves at the media registration table.
